properties.title: CASSIS (Climate Altimetric Studies with Sea Ice and Snow)
properties.description: This project aims to demonstrate: the use of radar echo processing methods (also called ‘retrackers’) based on physical models instead of current heuristic models; the use of new snow depth observation products (dual-frequency altimetry, Advanced Microwave Scanning Radiometer, AMSR); a better quantification of uncertainties in sea ice products.
properties.osc:consortium: CENTRE NATIONAL DE LA RECHERCHE SCIENTIFIQUE (CNRS) (FR)
